content.text:
> This allowed me to retrieve posts but that pub would not share my own posts (is this correct?). 

Yep!

> not just because I was too far out of their network but because my post wasnâ€™t getting shared

I think these are the same things. Pub invites are just a hacky way to give new users some social centrality, but you don't need them if you're already followed by someone else. Using a pub invite makes you visible to people who follow the pub, but it's much better to get a follow from a non-pub since many of us avoid pubs like the plague.
